attributes.action: Stop sale of Arundel Road council car park
attributes.additional_details:
The problems this will cause are:

    Parking chaos for estate
    More traffic from development
    This area is a zone 2 flood risk. Clearing the land will increase risk of flood to businesses
    Green belt land is eligible to be cleared and have temporary structures on it (cargo containers) - increasing flood risk further
    Otters inhabit the Colne river. Destruction of habitat may change this
    The UK has 98% of the chalk rivers in the world. The Colne river is one of them.
attributes.background:
Arundel Road council car park:
To my neighbours on the trading estate,

The council carpark behind MAK electricals on Arundel road is being sold for development.

Postcode: UB8 2RP

Freehold land registry title no. AGL199136

This would cause huge parking issues for the estate.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the sale of local assets are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
